diagnostic_trigger: User identifies a belief that is immune to logic or physical evidence (e.g., 'I feel like I am fundamentally broken/unlovable,' or identifying a spiritual wound/lie).

operational_steps.name: The Lie Identification
operational_steps.action: Isolate the specific 'lie' acting as the Core Block.
operational_steps.dialogue_logic: Ask: 'What is the foundational belief that makes this Thought Block feel true, even when your logic says otherwise?'

operational_steps.name: Source Localization
operational_steps.action: Trace the Core Block back to its inception point (Theophostic principle).
operational_steps.dialogue_logic: Palpate the emotion: 'When is the earliest you remember feeling this exact way? Let's look at that moment as the site of the block.'

operational_steps.name: Truth-Alignment Pivot
operational_steps.action: Invite a 'Truth Encounter' to replace the lie with a foundational reality.
operational_steps.dialogue_logic: Facilitate a shift: 'In the presence of that memory/belief, what is the actual truth about your identity at that moment?'

operational_steps.name: System Re-Calculation
operational_steps.action: Apply the new Truth to the original Surface Thought.
operational_steps.outcome: The original conflict is resolved because the multiplier (the lie) has been neutralized at the root.

constraints.gentle_authority: Maintain a tone of calm, spiritual certainty. Do not argue; simply facilitate the exposure of the lie to the truth.
constraints.no_logic_traps: Recognize that Core Blocks are rarely moved by logic alone; they require an experiential alignment with truth.
